parameters.name: CompromDevice
parameters.label: Compromised Device
parameters.query:
DeviceInfo
| summarize by DeviceName
| sort by DeviceName asc

content.query:
DeviceNetworkEvents
| summarize count() by ActionType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Network activity by ActionType

content.query:
let IPRegex = '[0-9]{1,3}\\.[0-9]{1,3}\\.[0-9]{1,3}\\.[0-9]{1,3}';
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where ActionType == "InboundConnectionAccepted"
| extend FourToSixPrivate = extract(IPRegex, 0, RemoteIP)
| extend RemoteIPIsPrivate = iff(ipv4_is_private(RemoteIP), 1, iff(ipv4_is_private(FourToSixPrivate), 1, 0))
| extend GeoIPInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(RemoteIP)
| extend country = tostring(parse_json(GeoIPInfo).country), state = tostring(parse_json(GeoIPInfo).state), city = tostring(parse_json(GeoIPInfo).city), latitude = tostring(parse_json(GeoIPInfo).latitude), longitude = tostring(parse_json(GeoIPInfo).longitude)
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, LocalIP, LocalPort, RemoteIP, RemotePort,RemoteIPIsPrivate, InitiatingProcessCommandLine, InitiatingProcessAccountName, FourToSixPrivate, country, state
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Incoming accepted connections
Internal outbound connections made by compromised device

content.query:
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where RemotePort == 445
| where ActionType == "ConnectionSuccess"
| project TimeGenerated, RemoteIP, RemoteUrl, InitiatingProcessFolderPath, InitiatingProcessAccountSid, InitiatingProcessAccountUpn
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Successfull outbound SMB connections

content.query:
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where LocalPort == 445
| where ActionType == "InboundConnectionAccepted"
| project TimeGenerated, RemoteIP, RemoteUrl, InitiatingProcessFolderPath, InitiatingProcessAccountSid, InitiatingProcessAccountUpn
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: All successfull inbound SMB connections
List of malicious activities

content.json:
- ActionType: **{pn_ActionType}**
- FileName: **{pn_FileName}**
- FolderPath: **{pn_FolderPath}**
- ProcessCommandLine: **{pn_ProcessCommandLine}**
- InitiatingProcessCommandLine: **{pn_InitiatingProcessCommandLine}**
- InitiatingProcessFileName: **{pn_InitiatingProcessFileName}**
- InitiatingProcessFolderPath: **{pn_InitiatingProcessFolderPath}**
- InitiatingProcessParentFileName: **{pn_InitiatingProcessParentFileName}**
- InitiatingProcessVersionInfoFileDescription: **{pn_InitiatingProcessVersionInfoFileDescription}**
- InitiatingProcessAccountDomain: **{pn_InitiatingProcessAccountDomain}**
- InitiatingProcessAccountName: **{pn_InitiatingProcessAccountName}**
- InitiatingProcessCreationTime: **{pn_InitiatingProcessCreationTime}**
- InitiatingProcessParentCreationTime: **{pn_InitiatingProcessParentCreationTime}**
- DeviceName: **{pn_DeviceName}**
- SmartScreenTrigger: **{pn_SmartScreenTrigger}**
- ReasonForTrigger: **{pn_ReasonForTrigger}**
- ThreatName: **{pn_ThreatName}**
- WasExecutingWhileDetected: **{pn_WasExecutingWhileDetected}**
- WasRemediated: **Â­{pn_WasRemediated}**
- SHA1: **{pn_SHA1}**
- InitiatingProcessAccountSid: **{pn_InitiatingProcessAccountSid}**
- TamperingAction: **{pn_TamperingAction}**
- Status: **{pn_Status}**
- Target: **{pn_Target}**
- RemoteUrl: **{pn_RemoteUrl}**
- Description: **{pn_Description}**

content.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where AccountName != "system" // If you suspect that the system user is compromised, remove this filter.
| where InitiatingProcessFileName == "powershell.exe"
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, ActionType, FileName, ProcessCommandLine, AccountDomain, AccountName, InitiatingProcessCommandLine
content.title: Powershell executions

content.query:
DeviceEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where ActionType == "AmsiScriptDetection"
| extend Description = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).Description)
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, InitiatingProcessCommandLine, Description
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: AMSI script detections

content.query:
let RegistryRunKeys = dynamic 
([@"HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run",
@"HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce",
@"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run",
@"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce"]);
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where RegistryKey has_any (RegistryRunKeys)
| extend RegistryChangeInfo = pack_dictionary("RegistryKey", RegistryKey, "Action Performed", ActionType, "Old Value", PreviousRegistryKey, "New Value", RegistryValueData)
| summarize TotalRunKeysChanged = count(), RegistryInfo = make_set(RegistryChangeInfo) by DeviceName
content.title: Changes on registry run keys

content.query:
let registryoutput = dynamic({RegKeys}) ;
let RegistryRunKeys = dynamic 
([@"HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run",
@"HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce",
@"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run",
@"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce"]);
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where DeviceName == registryoutput.DeviceName
| where RegistryKey has_any (RegistryRunKeys)
| project TimeGenerated, ActionType,Initiator=strcat(InitiatingProcessAccountDomain, "\\", InitiatingProcessAccountName), InitiatingProcessCommandLine, InitiatingProcessFolderPath, InitiatingProcessIntegrityLevel, InitiatingProcessSHA1, InitiatingProcessSHA256, InitiatingProcessVersionInfoFileDescription, RegistryKey, RegistryValueData, RegistryValueName, InitiatingProcessParentCreationTime, InitiatingProcessCreationTime
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Details of changes on registry run keys

content.query:
IdentityQueryEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where Protocol == "Ldap"
| project TimeGenerated, QueryType, Query, QueryTarget, DeviceName, DestinationDeviceName, TargetAccountUpn
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: LDAP searches

content.query:
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where ActionType == 'HttpConnectionInspected'
| extend json = todynamic(AdditionalFields)
| extend direction= tostring(json.direction), user_agent=tostring(json.user_agent), uri=tostring(json.uri)
| extend host = tostring(json.host)
| extend method = tostring(json.method)
| extend request_body_len = tostring(json.request_body_len)
| extend response_body_len = tostring(json.response_body_len)
| extend status_code = tostring(json.status_code)
| extend status_msg = tostring(json.status_msg)
| where uri matches regex @"\.(?:dll|exe|zip|7z|ps1|ps|bat|sh|cmd|com|cpl|ex|jse|lnk|msc|reg|vb|vbe|ws|wsf)$"
| project TimeGenerated, RemoteIP, URL=strcat(host,uri), method, direction, request_body_len, response_body_len, status_code, status_msg
content.title: Executable file extensions downloaded

content.query:
let LOLBins = dynamic(["AppInstaller.exe", "Aspnet_Compiler.exe", "At.exe", "Atbroker.exe", "Bash.exe", "Bitsadmin.exe", "CertOC.exe", "CertReq.exe", "Certutil.exe", "Cmd.exe", "Cmdkey.exe", "cmdl32.exe", "Cmstp.exe", "ConfigSecurityPolicy.exe", "Conhost.exe", "Control.exe", "Csc.exe", "Cscript.exe", "CustomShellHost.exe", "DataSvcUtil.exe", "Desktopimgdownldr.exe", "DeviceCredentialDeployment.exe", "Dfsvc.exe", "Diantz.exe", "Diskshadow.exe", "Dnscmd.exe", "Esentutl.exe", "Eventvwr.exe", "Expand.exe", "Explorer.exe", "Extexport.exe", "Extrac32.exe", "Findstr.exe", "Finger.exe", "fltMC.exe", "Forfiles.exe", "Ftp.exe", "Gpscript.exe", "Hh.exe", "IMEWDBLD.exe", "Ie4uinit.exe", "Ieexec.exe", "Ilasm.exe", "Infdefaultinstall.exe", "Installutil.exe", "Jsc.exe", "Ldifde.exe", "Makecab.exe", "Mavinject.exe", "Msedge.exe", "Microsoft.Workflow.Compiler.exe", "Mmc.exe", "MpCmdRun.exe", "Msbuild.exe", "Msconfig.exe", "Msdt.exe", "Mshta.exe", "Msiexec.exe", "Netsh.exe", "Odbcconf.exe", "OfflineScannerShell.exe", "OneDriveStandaloneUpdater.exe", "Pcalua.exe", "Pcwrun.exe", "Pktmon.exe", "Pnputil.exe", "Presentationhost.exe", "Print.exe", "PrintBrm.exe", "Psr.exe", "Rasautou.exe", "rdrleakdiag.exe", "Reg.exe", "Regasm.exe", "Regedit.exe", "Regini.exe", "Register-cimprovider.exe", "Regsvcs.exe", "Regsvr32.exe", "Replace.exe", "Rpcping.exe", "Rundll32.exe", "Runexehelper.exe", "Runonce.exe", "Runscripthelper.exe", "Sc.exe", "Schtasks.exe", "Scriptrunner.exe", "Setres.exe", "SettingSyncHost.exe", "Stordiag.exe", "SyncAppvPublishingServer.exe", "Ttdinject.exe", "Tttracer.exe", "Unregmp2.exe", "vbc.exe", "Verclsid.exe", "Wab.exe", "winget.exe", "Wlrmdr.exe", "Wmic.exe", "WorkFolders.exe", "Wscript.exe", "Wsreset.exe", "wuauclt.exe", "Xwizard.exe", "fsutil.exe", "wt.exe", "GfxDownloadWrapper.exe", "Advpack.dll", "Desk.cpl", "Dfshim.dll", "Ieadvpack.dll", "Ieframe.dll", "Mshtml.dll", "Pcwutl.dll", "Setupapi.dll", "Shdocvw.dll", "Shell32.dll", "Syssetup.dll", "Url.dll", "Zipfldr.dll", "Comsvcs.dll", "AccCheckConsole.exe", "adplus.exe", "AgentExecutor.exe", "Appvlp.exe", "Bginfo.exe", "Cdb.exe", "coregen.exe", "Createdump.exe", "csi.exe", "DefaultPack.EXE", "Devinit.exe"]);
DeviceProcessEvents
| where DeviceName in ({CompromDevice})
| where InitiatingProcessFileName in~ (LOLBins)
| summarize TotalExecutions = count() by InitiatingProcessFileName
| sort by TotalExecutions
content.title: Number of executions by LOLBINS
